contentencoded:
Olympic figure skating costumes are all about fit, flare, and a few thousand rhinestones. All that glitter isn't cheap. The dress Gracie Gold wore on the cover of Sports Illustrated would set you back $3,000.  

Designers say dresses run anywhere from $1,500 to $5,000 each. And Olympic contestants need more than one. It takes a wardrobe of shine to succeed on the ice.
title: How much do  Olympic figure skating dresses cost?
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, February 13, 2014
teaser: Love them or laugh at them, Olympics figure skating costumes are hard to ignore. They’re just so shiny.  But how much does all the sparkle cost? Thousands.
description: Love them or laugh at them, Olympics figure skating costumes are hard to ignore. They’re just so shiny.  But how much does all the sparkle cost? Thousands.
